-1.title: The Performance
-1.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

imdb.plot outline: Season 1:Sisqo, Nokio, Jazz and Woody formed the musical group Dru Hill, while in high school. The group has had tremendous success in the past, hitting multi-platinum status and including performing with Will smith in his Wild Wild West video. But as the members grew, the group separated, Woody left and Sisqo followed with a successful career. Under the guidance of best selling multi-platinum recording artist Keith Sweat, Dru Hill's challenge is hitting greatness once again, with their new album release: Indrupendence Day. With the arrival of a new member, Tao, and the different dynamic of the rest of the group, can Dru Hill stay together?
imdb.title: Keith Sweat's Platinum House
plot: Season 1:Sisqo, Nokio, Jazz and Woody formed the musical group Dru Hill, while in high school. The group has had tremendous success in the past, hitting multi-platinum status and including performing with Will smith in his Wild Wild West video. But as the members grew, the group separated, Woody left and Sisqo followed with a successful career. Under the guidance of best selling multi-platinum recording artist Keith Sweat, Dru Hill's challenge is hitting greatness once again, with their new album release: Indrupendence Day. With the arrival of a new member, Tao, and the different dynamic of the rest of the group, can Dru Hill stay together?::R. Potasso
